name: Keeping Up With the Cardassians (Chapter 1)
description: You’re in some serious financial trouble. Your only way out of this is to  participate in "Keeping Up with the Cardassians", a competitive reality show in which the contestants are flew to Mars and isolated from the outside world to live in a bunker with the Cardassians, the most elite Martian clan. Each week, the contestants are given a difficult challenge by the Cardassians and one of the contestants is eliminated, with the last contestant remaining winning a huge 3 trillion space currency prize.  To prepare for the tough challenges ahead of you, the organisers send you to a Orientation Bootcamp.
